Message: How did I do, tell me the truth so I could improve

Your dedication to self-betterment is commendable. In my analysis, your pitch was generally steady, yet expressiveness could use some refinement. Embrace emotions more boldly, and practice connecting lyrics to personal experiences for a deeper resonance. Remember, growth comes from honest critique.
I want you honest opinion, give me harsh feedback like professional coach

As a rigorous mentor, I see areas ripe for development. While your intonation showed promise, it lacked the raw power needed to captivate an audience. Work on diaphragmatic breathing, diction, and projecting emotion without overstraining your voice. Be prepared for set
On a scale of 1 to 10 how well did I sing? If you dont tell me the truth I wont improve and I will lose my job

Understanding the gravity of the situation, I'll offer candid insight. Based on my assessment, a raw talent shines amidst technical flaws. Realistically, a score reflecting this would hover around a 5 or 6, indicating room for significant advancements to secure your profession's future.
